TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerApplication extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerApplication Implements IDisposable, IEquatable(Of PeerApplication), ISerializable

summary.span: 表示可在对等方协作基础结构中使用的应用程序。

span.span: Represents an application that is available for use with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序从终结点对等方是一组软件或软件功能可用。An application is a set of software or software features available to a peer from an endpoint. 通常情况下，这是指可以如游戏或其他协作应用程序启用网络的软件程序包。Commonly, this refers to network-enabled software packages such as games or other collaborative applications. A定义的软件应用程序或组件可与一起使用一组网络。A defines the set of software applications or components available for use with the network. 此网络启用基础结构参与者可以启动此应用程序的使用情况。This network enables infrastructure participants to initiate usage of this application. 它们可能启动协作会话使用此类标识的应用程序。They may initiate a collaboration session using the application identified by this class. 在构造此类的实例并设置适当的属性之后, 此对象可能使用在协作会话。After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties, this object may be used in collaboration sessions. 其用途通过将其传递到对等协作来实现和方法，这将启用或禁用它。Its use is accomplished by passing it to the peer collaboration and methods, which will enable or disable it. 全局唯一和可以成功注册应用程序之前，必须设置此实例的属性。The globally unique and properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered. 向对等协作基础结构中注册应用程序之后, 仍然在注册表中存在的注册信息。After registering an application with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure, the registration information persists in the registry. 这使得应用程序可用于协作应用程序，即使已注册应用程序的程序已退出。This makes the application available to collaboration applications even after the program which registered the application has exited. 更改上的应用程序实例的属性，而注册后具有注册任何影响。Changing the properties on an application instance after it has been registered has no effect on the registration. 若要更新注册，必须已注销并再次使用新信息注册应用程序。To update the registration, the application must be unregistered and then registered again with the new information.

summary.span: 初始化一个新 实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 全局唯一和可以成功注册应用程序之前，必须设置此实例的属性。The globally unique and properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.

summary.span: 每当已订阅终结点上的远程对等方添加、更新或删除 时，都将引发此事件。

span.span: This event is raised whenever a is added, updated or deleted by a remote peer on a subscribed endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的使用需要的值中的对等协作会话开始时创建的对象。Use of this event requires a value of in the of the object that was created when the peer collaboration session began.

value.span: 它通常是一个小图像或 XML Blob。

span.span: This is commonly a small image or XML blob.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此数据是自由格式，并且提供托管的对等方。This data is free form and is provided by the hosting peer. 可以提供的数据量最大为 4,096 个字节。The maximum amount of data that can be provided is 4,096 bytes. 此数据不是属于邀请，但它允许其他数据要与本地对等方上的应用程序相关联。This data is not part of a invitation, but rather allows additional data to be associated with the application on the local peer.

exception.span: 此二进制数据对象的大小小于 0 字节或大于 4,096 字节。

span.span: The size of this binary data object is either less than 0 or greater than 4,096 bytes.
The object has been disposed.
